str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: From a variation of genos; to procreate; figuratively, to regenerate.
Blind, physically or mentally. From, tuphoo; opaque, i.e. blind.
